name: Mona Lisa
longDescription: Considered an archetypal masterpiece of the Italian Renaissance,[4][5] it has been described as the best known, the most visited, the most written about, the most sung about, the most parodied work of art in the world.[6] The painting's novel qualities include the subject's enigmatic expression,[7] monumentality of the composition, the subtle modelling of forms, and the atmospheric illusionism.[8]
